title: Bizarre cults
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/New Age movement
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/New Age movement
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Freedom of religion
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Hare Krishnas
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Evangelicalism - United States
description: Narrated by Sir David Frost, this program gives a brief overview of some of the major cults from around the world and includes information about what they believe and how they were founded. Cults covered include: Charles Manson's family; Branch Davidians; Aum Shrinriko, Moonies; the Order of the Solar Temple; Children of God; Hare Krishnas; Druidism; Flagellants; the Spacepeople of Damanhur; the Church of Scientology; Evangelism; Jehovah's Witness; Voodooism. Personalities covered include: Charles Manson; David Koresh; Shoko Asohara; L. Ron Hubbard; Tammy and Jim Baker.
